channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Metal Garage door and electrical equipment dumped in front garden, 16th April
item.description:
A metal garage door and an electrical item have been dumped in the front garden of a bungalow in South View Way Prestbury. This has happened at some time in the last 3 weeks or so.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 South View Way, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor parking, 16th April
item.description:
This car has been parked as shown. Just appears to be left on yellow lines

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Montpellier Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several large potholes in Granley road to Swanswell Drive, 16th April
item.description:
Several potholes in Granley Road from the garage down to the bend for Swanswell Drive. Then further potholes at the start of Swanswell drive on the right hand side (as well as the left) just after the bend.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 32 Granley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 144 Hester's Way Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Large potholes on A40 going towards town, 15th April
item.description:
There are several large potholes and gullies turning left onto the A40 from Princess Elizabeth Way going towards town. This is adjacent to the bus lane and has been getting worse over the past few weeks. This is enough to damage a vehicle. Evasive driving is getting harder as the potholes are getting bigger!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 42 MONKS, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes now merging into one large one., 15th April
item.description:
There are several potholes now merging into one long strip just after the bend going from Granley Road into Swanswell drive on the left hand side of the road, just before getting to Finstock Close.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Swanswell Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
